name: oop-project-byhassanali
description: A simple and interactive command-line application built with TypeScript that demonstrates basic Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles. The application allows users to talk to themselves or interact with students. Users can add new students by name and check if a student already exists in the list. The program uses Inquirer for user prompts and provides a friendly and engaging way to manage and interact with a list of students. Perfect for learning and teaching OOP concepts in a fun and interactive manner.
